featured.text: Strong command of English language OPENINGS***************************** ﹪ Chinese speaking and reading ability a must TOUR GUIDES ﹪ a university degree Duties: To conduct escorted tours for foreign visitors; ﹪ Journalism education and/or experience a plus to assist with travel and transportation arrangements.

other.text: Recalling the group’s first tour in Europe, Camake Valaule, a physical education teacher and the founder of the Taiwu Elementary School Folk Singers, admitted that he felt very nervous.

definition.zh_def: 旅行；參觀，通常是為了觀光或娛樂而進行的行程。
definition.en_def: A journey for pleasure in which several different places are visited.
definition.example: We decided to take a tour of the historic sites in the city.
